ingredients: 2 cm fresh ginger , peeled and finely grated
1 small bunch fresh mint , leaves picked
225 ml Dewar’s white label scotch whiskey , or cognac
200 ml tinned peach slices, in fruit juice
1 good splash elderflower or blackcurrant cordial
565 ml full cream or semi-skimmed milk
1 glass organic soya milk, skimmed milk or apple juice
½ part of lemon juice , (to taste)
4 dashes of Tabasco , (or hot pepper sauce)
1 pinch of fleur de sel (or sea salt)
1 large handful crushed ice , to serve
60ml blood orange juice , fresh or from a carton (cold)
5 cm piece fresh root ginger , peeled and roughly chopped
2 handfuls sweet ripe strawberries , preferably wild ones, hulled
1 pinch cardamom seeds , pods and husks removed, seeds pounded
1 passion fruit , plus extra to serve
3 large handfuls strawberries , preferably wild ones, hulled, washed and drained
300 g rhubarb , trimmed and finely sliced
a large handful of ice cubes
2 cinnamon sticks , plus extra to serve
1 tablespoon mixed seeds , (I like flaxseeds and sunflower seeds)
for a mango, passion fruit and mint smoothie:
1 tablespoon mixed seeds , (I like flaxseeds and sunflower seeds)
15 x 25 ml shots of Bacardi Oro
1 litre soda water or sparkling mineral water
a few sprigs of fresh mint
honey , or maple or agave syrup
1 x 340 g jar of runny honey
4 star anise , plus extra to garnish
15 ml clementine juice , plus a little extra
For the pear and vanilla syrup:
2 large chunks of fresh watermelon , aprrox 150g, plus extra to garnish
2 bottles Chianti or other Italian red wine
70 ml Bacardi 8 year old dark rum
1 sprig of fresh mint , leaves picked
1 whole lemon , cut into a slice and twist
freshly squeezed lemon juice , plus a slice of lemon to garnish each glass
cinnamon sticks , to garnish each glass
2 ripe peaches , flat ones if you can get them
2 parts Dewar’s White Label blended Scotch whisky
1 splash of Martini Brut sparkling wine
8 fresh mint leaves , plus a few extra to serve
½ cm piece fresh ginger , finely grated
15 ml Martini Riserva Speciale Ambrato Vermouth di Torino
¼ nutmeg , finely grated into the pan
10 - 15 ml lime juice , plus 1/2 lime to garnish
a sprig of mint , to garnish
1 teaspoon sugar syrup , (mix 2 parts sugar to 1 part water)
1 x 700 ml bottle quality vodka, gin or tequila
sliced citrus or strips of zest
1/3 part Créme de Violette liqueur (ideally Créme Yvette)
